<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92725</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92725</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le mouvement apparent des étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">The apparent motion of stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die offensichtliche Bewegung der Sterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento aparente das estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento apparente delle stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προφανής κίνηση των αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento evidente de estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'en raison de la rotation de la terre, les étoiles se déplacent le long  d'une direction comme on peut le voir de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that due to the Earth's rotation, the stars seem to move along one direction as seen from Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rotation de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth's rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement planétaire</string>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wegen der Umdrehung 
der Masse, die Sterne scheinen, entlang eine Richtung zu bewegen, wie 
gesehen von der Masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que  devido à rotação 
da terra, as estrelas parecem se mover ao longo de um sentido como 
visto da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che dovuto la 
rotazione della terra, le stelle sembrano muoversi lungo un senso come
visto da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι λόγω στη γήινη 
περιστροφή, τα αστέρια φαίνονται να κινούνται κατά μήκος μιας 
κατεύθυνσης όπως βλέπει από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que  debido a la 
rotación de la tierra, las estrellas se parecen moverse a lo largo de
una dirección según lo visto desde la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planetarische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotação da terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento planetário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrelas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rotazione della terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento planetario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη περιστροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλανητική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστέρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rotación de la tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento planetario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrellas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
